moves.1. e4: the same tournament (najdorf variation 6. Bg5) offered by enasab. Here is a variation that is clearly NOT to play for black
moves.7... Nc6: this opens a nice possibility for white. Nc6 has to be very cautious with black
moves.9... Qxd1+ 10. Rxd1 bxc6 11. fxe5: black pawn structure is already ruined and the next attempt to reconstruct it will face a nice punishment
moves.16... Kg7: the vague solution here was more in Nf5 followed by enventual Nh6 or a good exchange with one of the minor pieces... this becomes now a tragedy.
moves.17. Rxf7+ Kh6 18. Rxe7: and it is virtually over. The game was only interesting to show that 7. ... Nc6 is not a good idea.
